title: Canada: fibres, yarns and fabrics
creator_credit: ONF | NFB, Nicholas Balla, Julian Biggs and Gordon Sparling
brief_description: Shot at Bruck Mills Limited and Dominion Textiles Limited in Montreal, this film shows the rigid tests and quality controls that go into the manufacture of fine Canadian fabrics.
